intro.description:
Perspectives are collections of menus, buttons, and views. The IDE includes predefined perspectives configured around a task.
The jACT-R perspective provides access to common navigation, editing, and problem views in addition to custom views for dealing with ACT-R models.

item.title: Opening Perspective
item.description: You can open the perspective through the menu : Window, Open Perspective, and select jACT-R (or Other.. if it's not visible).
